Class DrawingBoard

java.lang.Object
  DrawingBoard

public class DrawingBoard
extends Object

Constructs a Drawing Board to store Shape objects.

Version:
CSC 143 Winter 15
Author:
Matthew Staehely

addShape

public void addShape(Shape s)
Adds a shape to the shapeList array.

Parameters:

colorShape

public void colorShape(Color c)
Colors a selected Shape.

Parameters:
c - the Color object used to set a Shape's color.
Throws:
IllegalStateException - if no shape is selected.

getNextShape

public String getNextShape()
Informs listener of what shape is to be created on next click.

Returns:
String the name of the shape to be created.

listShapes

public ArrayList<Shape> listShapes()
Returns an ArrayList copy of the original ArrayList for reference.

Returns:
a list of the Shapes.

moveShape

public void moveShape(int deltaX,
                      int deltaY)
Moves a selected Shape.

Parameters:
deltaX - moves the shape x number of pixels right.
deltaY - moves the shape y number of pixels down.
Throws:
IllegalStateException - if no Shape is selected.

notifyAllListeners

public void notifyAllListeners()
Updates all listeners when changes are made to the model.

Throws:
IllegalStateException - if system attempts to update when no listeners are registered.

notifyGraphicListeners

public void notifyGraphicListeners()
Notifies any of this object's graphical listeners of changes to the model.

Throws:
IllegalStateException - if system attempts to update when no listeners are registered.

referShape

public Shape referShape()
Passes a reference to the currently selected Shape.

Returns:
reference to the selected shape, or null if none is selected.

removeShape

public void removeShape()
Removes a shape from the DrawingBoard.

Throws:
IllegalStateException - if no Shape is selected.

selectShape

public void selectShape(int x,
                        int y)
Selects upper-most Shape which contains the x-y coordinates specified.

Parameters:
x - the x-coordinate of the indicated point.
y - the y-coordinate of the indicated point.
Throws:
IllegalArgumentException - if either coordinate is less than 0.

setNextShape

public void setNextShape(String shape)
Keeps track of the next shape to be added.

Parameters:
shape - the shape which will be added with the next mouse click in window.
